title: Butler Machine Walkthrough - Jenkins & Windows Privilege Escalation
excerpt: Complete Windows penetration test exploiting Jenkins with weak credentials, Groovy reverse shell execution, and privilege escalation via unquoted service path vulnerability.
content:
Overview

This walkthrough demonstrates exploiting a Jenkins server to gain initial access, then escalating privileges on Windows through an unquoted service path vulnerability. Learn password spraying, Groovy exploitation, and Windows privilege escalation techniques.

Read the full walkthrough →

title: Dev Machine Walkthrough - NFS, LFI & Privilege Escalation
excerpt: Advanced penetration testing walkthrough covering NFS enumeration, Local File Inclusion exploitation, password cracking, and privilege escalation via sudo zip abuse.
content:
Overview

This comprehensive walkthrough demonstrates multiple attack vectors on the Dev machine. Learn NFS mounting, LFI exploitation, fcrackzip usage, SSH key extraction, and GTFOBins sudo escalation techniques.

Read the full walkthrough →

title: Academy Machine Walkthrough - Complete Penetration Test
excerpt: Full penetration testing walkthrough of the Academy machine. Learn reconnaissance, hash cracking, PHP exploitation, and privilege escalation via cron job abuse.
content:
Overview

This comprehensive walkthrough covers the complete penetration test of the Academy machine. You'll learn FTP enumeration, hash cracking, directory bruteforcing, PHP reverse shell upload, and privilege escalation through cron job manipulation.

Read the full walkthrough →

title: Blue Machine Walkthrough - EternalBlue Exploit
excerpt: Complete step-by-step walkthrough exploiting the EternalBlue vulnerability (MS17-010) on a Windows machine using Metasploit Framework.
content:
Overview

This walkthrough demonstrates how to exploit the infamous EternalBlue vulnerability on a Windows 7 machine. You'll learn reconnaissance, exploitation, and post-exploitation techniques.

Read the full walkthrough →
